original_title: America's Atomic Bomb Tests: Operation Hardtack
overview: One of the few atomic testing operations ever to be conducted by the U.S. Department of Defense at both the Pacific Proving Grounds and the Nevada Test Site, Operation Hardtack combined balloon shots, surface shots, barge shots, underwater shots, underground shots, tower shots and missile shots.
title: America's Atomic Bomb Tests: Operation Hardtack
